attributes.action: Establish Proportional Representation in an Upper House at Least.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Do away with the house of Lords and replace it with an elected/appointed mix of people to represent by proportion. No more than 200 members and split by the national percentages of the prior general election. Maximum 5 year terms and maximum of 2 terms for any individual.
